findings.rationale: An indefinite term can lead to perpetual obligations, potentially causing future legal complications or challenges in defining the scope of confidentiality.
findings.evidence_quote: This Agreement shall remain in effect indefinitely and shall survive termination of any business relationship between the parties.

findings.risk_title: Lack of Limitation on Confidential Information
findings.rationale: The broad definition of Confidential Information may lead to ambiguity and disputes over what constitutes confidential data, increasing the risk of unintentional breaches.
findings.evidence_quote: Confidential Information means all non-public, proprietary or confidential information disclosed by the Disclosing Party to the Receiving Party.

findings.rationale: While the clause mandates return of information, it does not specify how disputes regarding the return will be resolved, which could lead to issues.
findings.evidence_quote: Upon termination, the Receiving Party shall return all Confidential Information to the Disclosing Party.
